description.en:
This task type requires the player to gain a certain amount of experience. 
For this task, the player's experience level needs to reach level 2.
description.ru:
This task type requires the player to gain a certain amount of experience. 
For this task, the player's experience level needs to reach level 2.
description.zh:
该任务类型需要玩家获得一定经验值。
对于该任务，需要玩家经验等级到达2级。

description.en: For this task, players are required to submit 100 experience points.
description.ru: For this task, players are required to submit 100 experience points.
description.zh: 对于该任务，需要玩家提交100点经验值。

description.en:
This reward type adds experience to the player when claimed. 
For this reward, it will add 3 levels of experience to the player when claiming it. 
In addition, the reward is automatically claimed.
description.ru:
This reward type adds experience to the player when claimed. 
For this reward, it will add 3 levels of experience to the player when claiming it. 
In addition, the reward is automatically claimed.
description.zh:
该奖励类型在领取时给玩家增加经验值。
对于该奖励，在领取时会给玩家增加3级经验。
另外，该奖励自动领取。

description.en: For this reward, 200 experience points will be added to the player upon claiming it.
description.ru: For this reward, 200 experience points will be added to the player upon claiming it.
description.zh: 对于该奖励，在领取时会给玩家增加200点经验值。
